# jsdoc/require-property-description <Badge type="info" text="Correctness" />

<div class="rule-meta">
<Alert class="default-on" type="success">
<span class="emoji">âœ…</span> This rule is turned on by default.
</Alert>
</div>

### What it does

Requires that all `@property` tags have descriptions.

### Why is this bad?

The description of a property should be documented.

### Examples

Examples of **incorrect** code for this rule:

```javascript
/**
 * @typedef {SomeType} SomeTypedef
 * @property {number} foo
 */
```

Examples of **correct** code for this rule:

```javascript
/**
 * @typedef {SomeType} SomeTypedef
 * @property {number} foo Foo.
 */
```
